language.introduction: Welcome Born to Sail exercises. Some introductory text.

question_01.question: This sign means:
question_01.name: Crossing sign
options: Order to stay to the right side of the shipping lane

question_03.question: This sign means:
question_03.name: No overtaking (dotyczy tylko zestawów)
options: No overtaking dotyczący jachtów z napędem żaglowym

question_05.question: If you see this sign, can you overtake another vessel?
question_05.name: No passing and no overtaking

question_06.question: This sign means:
question_06.name: No anchoring or mooring at the shore
options: No anchoring or mooring at the shore

question_07.question: If you see this sign, can you moor at the shore?
question_07.name: No anchoring or mooring at the shore

question_08.question: This sign means:
question_08.name: No halting at the width specified on the sign in meters (from the sign)
options: No halting at the width specified on the sign in nautical miles
No halting at the width specified on the sign in meters

question_09.question: The depicted sign prohibits:
question_09.name: No anchoring, no dragging the anchor, chain or rope
options: Dragging the anchor, chain or rope

question_10.question: Can you moor seeing such a sign?
question_10.name: No mooring at the shore
options: The information is placed under the sign

question_11.question: Can you turn back when you see such a sign?
question_11.name: No U-Turns

question_14.question: When you see this sign, can you continue going with the engine?
question_14.name: Ban on power-driven vessels
options: Yes, when using an electric engine

question_15.question: When you see this sign, can you continue sailing??
question_15.name: No vessels used for sports and recreation
options: Yes, only when using an engine

question_16.question: Czy widząc taki znak można holować narciarza?
question_16.name: Water skiing and towing are prohibited
options: Yes, only when wave is created

question_17.question: If the helmsperson sees such a sign, can s|he continue?
question_17.name: Sailing prohibited
options: Yes, with a different drive than sails

question_18.question: The sign prohibits further swimming:
question_18.name: Ships other than motor and sailing are prohibited

question_20.question: If the helmsperson sees such a sign, can s|he continue?
question_20.name: The end of a zone where small sports or recreation vessels could develop high speeds

question_21.question: Can you launch a vessel when you see such a sign?
question_21.name: Launching and hauling ships ashore forbidden
options: Yes, if it doesn't pollute the environment
